page.title: 18RHYMNEY PLACE NAMES LANGUAGE
page.content: Many place names in Rhymney are still referred to by their Welsh names.This is part of the heritage of the area and examination of the meanings gives an interesting insight into the topography of the area itself. {BLAEN RHYMNEY-}SOURCE OF THE RHYMNEY {PENRHEOL-}TOP OR END OF THE ROAD {TWYN-YR-ARIAN-}SILVER HILL {PEN COED CAE-}FIELD NEAR THE TOP OF THE WOOD {FFOS-Y-HEBOG-}DITCH OF THE PEREGRINE FALCON {BRYN OER-}COLD HILL {CARNO-}CAIRN OR HEAP {RHYD-Y-MILWYR-}WARRIORS' FORD {RHIW-YR-UCHAU-}CATTLE SLOPE {LLECHRYD-}PLACE OF THE FORD OR SLATE FORD {RHOS LAS-}GREEN MOOR {CEFN COED RHYCHDIR-}WOODED RIDGE BY FURROWED LAND
